```{r convert_network_to_cytoscape_format}

#--------- functions ------------

make_cyto_net_file_from_excel_network <- 
  function(network_excel_path, output_path, cancer_name) {

  output_file <- paste(output_path, cancer_name, ".csv", sep="")
  input_file <- paste(network_excel_path, cancer_name,".csv", sep="")
  the_network <- read.csv(input_file, row.names=1)
  
  cat("chaperon,protain,value", file=output_file)
  cat("\n", file=output_file, append=TRUE)
  
  for (row in rownames(the_network)) {
    for (col in colnames(the_network)) {
      val <- the_network[row, col]
      if (val>0) {
        strr <- paste(row, col, "1", sep = ",")
        cat(strr, file=output_file, append=TRUE)
        cat("\n", file=output_file, append=TRUE)
      }
    }
  }
}

#--------- consts ---------------

excel_path <- "C:/Users/Geut/Desktop/Lab Analysis/cross cancer analysis/HPC/results 27.5.21/binari_tables/"
outpt_path <- paste(network_excel_path, "cyto_files/", sep="")

tissue_list <- c('Breast Invasive Carcinoma',

                 'Kidney_Renal_Clear_Cell_Carcinoma',

                 'Liver_Hepatocellular_Carcinoma',
                 'Lung_Adenocarcinoma',
                 'Lung_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma',
                 'Prostate_Adenocarcinoma',
                 'Stomach_Adenocarcinoma',
                 'Thyroid_Carcinoma',
                 'Uterine_Corpus_Endometrial_Carcinoma')

#--------- run ----------------

for (cancer in tissue_list) {
  make_cyto_net_file_from_excel_network(excel_path, outpt_path, cancer)
}
```
